 **Solution**

**Row Operations:**

Step 1: $r_3 := r_3 - (-1)r_1$
$\begin{bmatrix} 1 & 1 & -2 & | & 1 & 0 & 0 \\ 0 & 1 & -1 & | & 0 & 1 & 0 \\ 0 & 2 & -1 & | & 1 & 0 & 1 \end{bmatrix}$

Step 2: $r_1 := r_1 - r_2$
$\begin{bmatrix} 1 & 0 & -1 & | & 1 & -1 & 0 \\ 0 & 1 & -1 & | & 0 & 1 & 0 \\ 0 & 2 & -1 & | & 1 & 0 & 1 \end{bmatrix}$

Step 3: $r_3 := r_3 - (2)r_2$
$\begin{bmatrix} 1 & 0 & -1 & | & 1 & -1 & 0 \\ 0 & 1 & -1 & | & 0 & 1 & 0 \\ 0 & 0 & 1 & | & 1 & -2 & 1 \end{bmatrix}$

Step 4: $r_1 := r_1 - (-1)r_3$
$\begin{bmatrix} 1 & 0 & 0 & | & 2 & -3 & 1 \\ 0 & 1 & -1 & | & 0 & 1 & 0 \\ 0 & 0 & 1 & | & 1 & -2 & 1 \end{bmatrix}$

Step 5: $r_2 := r_2 - (-1)r_3$
$\begin{bmatrix} 1 & 0 & 0 & | & 2 & -3 & 1 \\ 0 & 1 & 0 & | & 1 & -1 & 1 \\ 0 & 0 & 1 & | & 1 & -2 & 1 \end{bmatrix}$

b) nullity($A$) = 0

c) det($A$) = 0

d) $A^{-1} = \begin{bmatrix} 1 & 0 & 0 \\ 0 & 1 & 0 \\ 1 & -2 & 1 \end{bmatrix}$

e) ker($A$) = $\{\mathbf{0}\}$

 **Solution**

**Row Operations:**

Step 1: $r_1 := r_1 - (3)r_2$
$\begin{bmatrix} 1 & 0 & -2 & | & 1 & -3 & 0 \\ 0 & 1 & 2 & | & 0 & 1 & 0 \\ 0 & 1 & 2 & | & 0 & 0 & 1 \end{bmatrix}$

Step 2: $r_3 := r_3 - r_2$
$\begin{bmatrix} 1 & 0 & -2 & | & 1 & -3 & 0 \\ 0 & 1 & 2 & | & 0 & 1 & 0 \\ 0 & 0 & 0 & | & 0 & -1 & 1 \end{bmatrix}$

**Results:**

a) rank($A$) = 2

b) nullity($A$) = 1

c) det($A$) = 0

d) $A^{-1} = \text{does not exist}$

e) ker($A$) = $\text{span}\left\{\begin{bmatrix} -2 \\ -2 \\ 1 \end{bmatrix}\right\}$

 **Solution**

**Row Operations:**

Step 1: $r_2 := r_2 - (2)r_1$
$\begin{bmatrix} 1 & 0 & -1 & | & 1 & 0 & 0 \\ 0 & 1 & 0 & | & -2 & 1 & 0 \\ -2 & -1 & 3 & | & 0 & 0 & 1 \end{bmatrix}$

Step 2: $r_3 := r_3 - (-2)r_1$
$\begin{bmatrix} 1 & 0 & -1 & | & 1 & 0 & 0 \\ 0 & 1 & 0 & | & -2 & 1 & 0 \\ 0 & -1 & 1 & | & 2 & 0 & 1 \end{bmatrix}$

Step 3: $r_3 := r_3 - (-1)r_2$
$\begin{bmatrix} 1 & 0 & -1 & | & 1 & 0 & 0 \\ 0 & 1 & 0 & | & -2 & 1 & 0 \\ 0 & 0 & 1 & | & 0 & 1 & 1 \end{bmatrix}$

Step 4: $r_1 := r_1 - (-1)r_3$
$\begin{bmatrix} 1 & 0 & 0 & | & 1 & 1 & 1 \\ 0 & 1 & 0 & | & -2 & 1 & 0 \\ 0 & 0 & 1 & | & 0 & 1 & 1 \end{bmatrix}$

**Results:**

a) rank($A$) = 3

b) nullity($A$) = 0

c) det($A$) = 0

d) $A^{-1} = \begin{bmatrix} 1 & 0 & 0 \\ -2 & 3 & 2 \\ 0 & 1 & 1 \end{bmatrix}$

e) ker($A$) = $\{\mathbf{0}\}$

 **Solution**

**Row Operations:**

Step 1: $r_1 := r_1 - (-2)r_2$
$\begin{bmatrix} 1 & 0 & 2 & | & 1 & 2 & 0 \\ 0 & 1 & 1 & | & 0 & 1 & 0 \\ 0 & 0 & 0 & | & 0 & 0 & 1 \end{bmatrix}$

**Results:**

a) rank($A$) = 2

b) nullity($A$) = 1

c) det($A$) = 0

d) $A^{-1} = \text{does not exist}$

e) ker($A$) = $\text{span}\left\{\begin{bmatrix} 0 \\ -1 \\ 1 \end{bmatrix}\right\}$



**Solution**

**Row Operations:**

Step 1: $r_2 \leftrightarrow r_3$
$\begin{bmatrix} 1 & -3 & -3 & | & 1 & 0 & 0 \\ 0 & -1 & 0 & | & 0 & 0 & 1 \\ 0 & 0 & 1 & | & 0 & 1 & 0 \end{bmatrix}$

Step 2: $r_2 := -1r_2$
$\begin{bmatrix} 1 & -3 & -3 & | & 1 & 0 & 0 \\ 0 & 1 & 0 & | & 0 & 0 & -1 \\ 0 & 0 & 1 & | & 0 & 1 & 0 \end{bmatrix}$

Step 3: $r_1 := r_1 - (-3)r_2$
$\begin{bmatrix} 1 & 0 & -3 & | & 1 & 0 & -3 \\ 0 & 1 & 0 & | & 0 & 0 & -1 \\ 0 & 0 & 1 & | & 0 & 1 & 0 \end{bmatrix}$

Step 4: $r_1 := r_1 - (-3)r_3$
$\begin{bmatrix} 1 & 0 & 0 & | & 1 & 3 & -3 \\ 0 & 1 & 0 & | & 0 & 0 & -1 \\ 0 & 0 & 1 & | & 0 & 1 & 0 \end{bmatrix}$

**Results:**

a) rank($A$) = 3

b) nullity($A$) = 0
